SELECT BOARD_NO, MEMBER_AUTHORITY, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, BOARD_CONTENT,MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_NO,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT
FROM BOARD B JOIN "MEMBER" USING("MEMBER_NO")
WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND ARTIST_GROUP_NO = #{artistGroupNo} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_AUTHORITY,MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_NO,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_ENROLL_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_ENROLL_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_ENROLL_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_ENROLL_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_ENROLL_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_ENROLL_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_ENROLL_DATE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT LEVEL, C.* FROM (SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_NO, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, NENBER_PROFILE, BOARD_PARENT_COMMENT_NO, BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "BOARD_COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}) C WHERE BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N' OR 0 != (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_COMMENT" SUB WHERE SUB.BOARD_PARENT_COMMENT_NO = C.BOARD_COMMENT_NO AND BOARD_COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') START WITH BOARD_PARENT_COMMENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR BOARD_COMMENT_NO = BOARD_PARENT_COMMENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY BOARD_COMMENT_NO
